attributes.action: Have an E-Poster of Madeleine McCann on all Government Websites - around the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition most urgently the Prime Minister to keep in focus Madeleine McCann by placing an e-poster of Madeleine on all Government Department Websites around the world.

In particular the Foreign Office and Overseas departments and of course 10 Downing Street.

The British Government has a duty to assist this 'British'little vulnerable (4) year old girl - to be traced and reunited with her family.
